tool_description: Validates maintenance schedules against regulatory requirements, industry standards, and organizational policies.

regulation_standards.description: Applicable regulation standards to check against

facility_type.description: Type of facility (office, hospital, school, manufacturing, retail, warehouse)

error_messages: Invalid schedule reference: schedule_id not found in the system.
Invalid regulation standards: One or more regulation standards not recognized.
Invalid facility type: Use one of [office, hospital, school, manufacturing, retail, warehouse].
Invalid jurisdiction: Use one of [federal, state, local, international].
usage: Provide schedule_id, regulation_standards array, and facility_type to validate maintenance schedules against compliance requirements. Optionally specify jurisdiction for location-specific regulations.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, warning

violations_found.description: Array of compliance violations or issues identified

recommendations.description: Recommendations to achieve or maintain compliance
